name: SuggestionResults

methods.name: getSuggestionResults
methods.description: Returns a list of SuggestionResult objects from the response to a call to Search.suggest(String, String, Search.SuggestionOption).

methods.name: hasMoreResults
methods.description: Indicates whether a call to System.Search.suggest(String, String, Search.SuggestionOption) has more results available than were returned.

description: Wraps the results returned by the Search.suggest(â€‹String, String, Search.SuggestionOption) method.
